subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Memphis Tigers opened a 17-point lead in the game’s first 16 minutes, which was reduced to 5 early in the second half before going on a 18-4 run to seal their 85-67 win over Texas.
snippet: The Memphis Tigers opened a 17-point lead in the game’s first 16 minutes, which was reduced to 5 early in the second half before going on a 18-4 run to seal their 85-67 win over Texas.
